metadata.dc:author: Suitti, O N
metadata.dc:description: Created by Prof. Dr. Ignacio Ymaz, Counsellor of the Faculty of Medicine, his aim was to organize by hierarchy the professional people who up to that moment (1920) got, when they finished their studies, the so called "Dentist" degree. This year we recall 75 years of its creation, relating the different steps and situations that led to its sanction.
metadata.dc:title: Bodas de brillante del doctorado en odontolog√≠a.
[Dental Doctoral Degree. Its "diamond wedding" (75th anniversary)].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista del Museo de la Facultad de Odontologia de Buenos Aires
